title: Bioinformatics and Medicine Projects
description: Building cloud-based applications for tracking samples, clinical data, pathology images, genomic sequencing data and analysis pipelines.
caption: Seagull, Outer Banks, NC

projects.title: Test, Visualize and Manage Bioinformatics Pipelines
projects.summary: Develops a smart pipeline management system with Intelligence and Insights.

projects.title: CrowdSeq: Linking Discoveries for Genes and Variants
projects.summary: Develops a unified database for storing annotations from crowdsourcing.

projects.title: Clinical Data Collection System
projects.summary: A website using forms and templates to collect patient clinical data and reports from collaborators.

projects.title: Sequencing Data Monitoring and Automation System
projects.summary: A cloud-based system to monitor and automatically import/match sequencing data from Illumina BaseSpace and other sequencing service providers.

projects.title: Sample Tracking for Genomic Sequencing
projects.summary: Develops a database, web interface and APIs for tracking patient samples throughout genomic sequencing and analysis process.

projects.title: Pathology Data Collection and Review System
projects.summary: A website designed for collaborators from 20+ labs/hospitals around the world to upload and review pathology data, including high resolution images and reports.
